QuestData.Title: Taking Stock
QuestData.Description: I was dispatched back to camp to gather pitch-tipped arrows for our archers at the bridge, and this is what I came to. I trained with most of these pandaren... I wasn't prepared for this.$B$BStill, the archers at the bridge need our help. If you could help gather arrows from the wreckage, then maybe we can salvage something from this horror.
QuestData.CompletionText: The pandaren at the bridge are depending on us...
QuestData.RewardText: I... you... er, thank you. You didn't have to help, but you did. Thank you.
